title: "Group 30 Final Project"

Packages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv("data/_raw/SAA_Biospecimen_Analysis_results_01nov2025.csv")
```

```{r}
head(raw_data)
```

```{r}

amprion_data <- raw_data %>%
  filter(SAAMethod == "Amprion-24h alpha-synuclein-SAA")
```

```{r}
ggplot(amprion_data, aes(x = SEX, fill = SEX)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "Cohort Composition",
       x = "SEX",
       y = "Number of Participants") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

```{r}
ggplot(amprion_data, aes(x = CLINICAL_EVENT, fill = CLINICAL_EVENT)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "CLINICAL_EVENT",
       x = "CLINICAL_EVENT",
       y = "Number of Participants") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
